thread.section_title: Wiggle.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Wiggle.com | www.wiggle.com | 2 of 89
thread.title: Bob SF CA
thread.title_full: Wiggle.com reviewed by Bob SF CA

author: Bob SF CA
title: Bob SF CA
text: No question Wiggle offers great products at great prices ant their customer service is top shelf but shipping is so nerve wracking it almost negates the first two. Tracking is basically useless and provides very little detail and in top of shipping delays, my order had three shipping companies involved, you also need to deal with customs. I like Wiggle but I'd like them a lot more if shipping was solid and predictable. Although, to be fair. As soon as you ad customs in the mix all bets are off.
